name: Hotel Dash Suite Success
summary: When Quinn's new travel business hits a snag, she needs Flo's patented elbow grease to help renovate and run hotels all over DinerTown™! As Flo, you will deliver guest's luggage, drop off room service and provide extra towels, blankets and anything else they may need to stay happy and leave big tips!
info:
• 别名: Hotel Dash™ Suite Success™
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 经营
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2009年12月24日
